description: This file defines the main App component for a calculator frontend built with React Native and TypeScript. It manages calculator state, handles user input, performs calculations via utility functions, and renders the UI including display and buttons.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main functional React component managing calculator logic and UI.

methods.name: handleClearEntry
methods.description: Clears the current entry, resetting current value and related states.

methods.name: handleAllClear
methods.description: Resets the calculator to its initial state.

methods.name: handleDigit
methods.description: Handles input of digit characters, building the current number.

methods.name: handleDecimal
methods.description: Inserts a decimal point into current number if not already present.

methods.name: handleToggleSign
methods.description: Toggles the sign (+/-) of the current value.

methods.name: handlePercent
methods.description: Converts the current value to a percentage.

methods.name: commitPendingOpIfNeeded
methods.description: Evaluates any pending operation before setting a new operator.

methods.name: handleOperator
methods.description: Sets or evaluates the current operator.

methods.name: handleEquals
methods.description: Calculates the result of the current operation.

methods.name: handleBackspace
methods.description: Removes the last digit from current input.

methods.name: handleZero
methods.description: Handles the special case of zero input.
